Here's what the problem was:

The base class contained 
<pre>
public static Test suite() { 
  return new TestSuite(myBaseClase.class);
}
</pre>

Any class that has that call, only its test methods will be called.

So I moved that the subclass (using the subclass' name now of 
course), and now everything works fine.

r:b:
